education.area: B.Tech in Computer Science and Technology

highlights: Developed a microservice architecture for a high-traffic e-commerce platform.
Implemented a real-time notification system using WebSockets.
Optimized database queries to improve application performance.
Led a team of developers to refactor legacy codebase.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for mobile applications.
Integrated third-party payment gateways for seamless transactions.
Developed a custom logging framework for better error tracking.
Implemented a caching mechanism to reduce server load.
Automated deployment processes using CI/CD pipelines.
Conducted code reviews and provided mentorship to junior developers.
Developed a machine learning model for predictive analytics.
Implemented data visualization dashboards using D3.js.
Optimized ETL processes for faster data ingestion.
Collaborated with data scientists to deploy machine learning models.
Developed a chatbot using natural language processing techniques.
Implemented a recommendation engine for personalized user experiences.
Developed a mobile application for real-time location tracking.
Implemented push notifications for user engagement.
Created a RESTful API for backend services.
Developed a user authentication system using OAuth.
Implemented a feature for offline data synchronization.

projects.name: Project Alpha
highlights: A platform for real-time data analytics and visualization.
Designed to handle large-scale data processing.
Provides interactive dashboards for data exploration.
Supports integration with various data sources.

projects.name: Project Beta
highlights: Developed a command-line tool for automating repetitive tasks.
Supports integration with various APIs.
Provides a user-friendly interface for configuration.
Includes features for error handling and logging.

projects.name: Project Gamma
highlights: An internal tool for managing project documentation.
Implements a version control system for documents.
Supports collaborative editing and commenting.
Provides a search functionality for easy document retrieval.
